definition: to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)

sentences.english: The Sanskrit text had to be transliterated.
sentences.chinese: 這些梵語文本應該轉譯過來。

sentences.english: When you see rendering artifacts in an application, try turning off hardware acceleration.
sentences.chinese: 在應用程式中看見轉譯疊影時，請嘗試關閉硬體加速。

sentences.english: The invalid characters are translated into escaped numeric entity encodings.
sentences.chinese: 無效的字元會轉譯成逸出數字實體編碼方式。

sentences.english: The study appears today in Science Translational Medicine.
sentences.chinese: 這項研究出現於《科學轉譯醫學》中。

sentences.english: Consequently , the translation task must not be complex.
sentences.chinese: 因此，它只能執行簡單的轉譯任務。

sentences.english: But faith in brands still does not translate into brand loyalty.
sentences.chinese: 不過，對品牌的信任並不能轉譯爲品牌忠誠度。

sentences.english: Some of your feelings and thoughts are tra lated into objects.
sentences.chinese: 你們的一些感情和思想被轉譯爲物體。

definition: variant of 圖像|图像[tu2 xiang4]
study of classic texts, including interpretation, glossaries and commentaries
Chinese phonetics (concerned also with rhyme in poetry)
